channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
Ok, 2 questions.
1. How would I make it so if a certain item is dropped from an npc, it says a message?
2. How would I add a delay to a shield that could do damage along with the weapon? Like whip hits 41, THEN the shield hits?
